entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 15.
